title: Authorization by the council
context: [ยง56-1 Authorization by the council.] The council of any county may acquire the land for and authorize the improvement, construction, maintenance, repair and operation of public off-street parking facilities within the county. The term &ldquo;public off-street parking facilities&rdquo; means and includes land necessary or convenient for public off-street parking, rights-of-way, streets, or alleys necessary or convenient for ingress to or egress from such public off-street parking facilities, buildings, equipment, or any other property necessary or convenient for off-street parking purposes. [L 1970, c 173, pt of ยง1]
